decision_conditions: AMENDED: Condition 5 (Accordance with Approved Plans)
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers:
Masterplans
MP 051 Rev. 00 (Masterplan: Block Plan Setting Out)
MP 060 Rev. 00 (Masterplan: Amenity Diagram)
MP 100 Rev. P4 (Masterplan: Ground Floor Plan)
MP 101 Rev. P2 (Masterplan: First Floor Plan)
MP 111 Rev. P2 (Masterplan: Roof Heights AOD)

MP 113 Rev. P2 (Masterplan: Roof Height PVS)
MP 114 Rev. P0 (Masterplan: Roof Height Colour Coded)
MP 730 Rev. P3 (Masterplan: Parking Layout)

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved,  other than condition 5 which is superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 1331/APP/2021/751 , dated 19-05-21, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
The following plans have been superseded:

description: Section 96A for Non-Material Amendment to planning application reference 1331/APP/2019/2314, dated 28/06/2021 (Development of 4 no. new buildings comprising residential units (in addition to those approved under planning permission ref: 1331/APP/2017/1883), a basement extension to Block B, flexible commercial uses (Class E) and associated landscaping, access, car parking and other engineering works) to amend Condition 5 (approved plans) to facilitate amendments to core layouts, fenestration and balcony configuration, and the introduction of a car park smoke extract system.
